definition: The practice of listening to internal body sounds using a stethoscope
usage_example: The doctor performed auscultation of the patient's heart and lungs.

definition: Difficulty or labored breathing; shortness of breath
usage_example: The patient complained of dyspnea when climbing stairs.

definition: High blood pressure; a condition where blood pressure is consistently elevated
usage_example: The patient's hypertension requires medication management.

definition: Slow heart rate, typically fewer than 60 beats per minute
usage_example: The ECG showed bradycardia with a rate of 45 bpm.

definition: Fast heart rate, typically more than 100 beats per minute
usage_example: The patient developed tachycardia following the procedure.

definition: Infection that inflames air sacs in one or both lungs
usage_example: The chest X-ray confirmed pneumonia in the right lower lobe.

definition: A procedure to look inside the airways and lungs using a bronchoscope
usage_example: Bronchoscopy revealed inflammatory changes in the bronchi.

definition: Coughing up blood from the respiratory tract
usage_example: The patient presented with hemoptysis and chest pain.

definition: Heart attack; death of heart muscle due to blocked blood supply
usage_example: The patient was admitted with acute myocardial infarction.

definition: Chest pain caused by reduced blood flow to the heart
usage_example: The patient experiences angina during physical exertion.

definition: A metabolic disorder characterized by high blood sugar levels
usage_example: The patient has Type 2 diabetes mellitus well controlled with metformin.

definition: Low blood sugar level, typically below 70 mg/dL
usage_example: The patient experienced symptoms of hypoglycemia after insulin administration.

definition: Surgical removal of the appendix
usage_example: The patient underwent laparoscopic appendectomy for acute appendicitis.

definition: Surgical removal of the gallbladder
usage_example: Cholecystectomy is recommended for recurrent gallstone attacks.

definition: Minimally invasive surgery using a laparoscope through small incisions
usage_example: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed adhesions in the pelvis.

definition: A collection of blood outside blood vessels, usually clotted
usage_example: A large hematoma formed at the injection site.

definition: Formation of a blood clot inside a blood vessel
usage_example: Deep vein thrombosis was confirmed by duplex ultrasound.

definition: Blockage of a blood vessel by a clot, air bubble, or other substance
usage_example: Pulmonary embolism was ruled out with CT angiogram.

definition: Temporary loss of consciousness due to insufficient blood flow to the brain
usage_example: The patient experienced syncope during the procedure.

definition: Sudden, uncontrolled electrical activity in the brain
usage_example: The patient had a generalized tonic-clonic seizure.

definition: Inflammation of the kidneys
usage_example: Acute nephritis was diagnosed based on urinalysis findings.

definition: Medical procedure to remove waste and excess water from blood when kidneys fail
usage_example: The patient requires hemodialysis three times per week.

definition: Inflammation of the stomach lining
usage_example: Chronic gastritis was confirmed by endoscopy and biopsy.

definition: Medical procedure using an endoscope to examine interior surfaces of an organ
usage_example: Upper endoscopy revealed peptic ulcer disease.

definition: Break in the continuity of a bone
usage_example: X-ray showed a displaced fracture of the femur.

definition: Condition where bones become weak and brittle
usage_example: DEXA scan confirmed osteoporosis in the lumbar spine.

definition: Inflammation of one or more joints causing pain and stiffness
usage_example: Rheumatoid arthritis affects multiple joints symmetrically.

definition: Medical procedure involving extraction of tissue for diagnostic examination
usage_example: Liver biopsy was performed to determine the cause of hepatitis.

definition: Cancerous; having the properties of cancer
usage_example: Histology confirmed malignant cells in the lymph node.

definition: Non-cancerous; not harmful
usage_example: The tumor was found to be benign on pathological examination.
